name: my-basic-ts-starter
description: A basic starter project for TypeScript

scripts.dev: echo 'Starting TypeScript in dev mode with ts-node...' && ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.watch: echo 'Watching for TypeScript changes and compiling to dist/' && tsc --watch
scripts.build: echo 'Cleaning and building TypeScript project...' && rimraf dist && tsc
scripts.start: echo 'Starting compiled JavaScript from dist/' && node dist/index.js

author: Theodore Negusu
